hero.headline: Noura's Butterflies
hero.description: Founded with a passion for natural beauty and a commitment to ethical cosmetics, Noura's Butterflies brings you the finest vegan, cruelty-free products that nourish your skin and respect our planet.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create exceptional beauty products that are 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and environmentally sustainable, without compromising on quality or performance.

vegan.title: 100% Vegan
vegan.description: All our products are completely free from animal-derived ingredients.

crueltyFree.title: Cruelty-Free
crueltyFree.description: We never test our products on animals, ever.

sustainable.title: Sustainable
sustainable.description: We use eco-friendly packaging and sustainable sourcing practices.

natural.title: Natural Ingredients
natural.description: We use only the finest natural ingredients in our formulations.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Noura's Butterflies began as a dream to create beauty products that wouldn't compromise between effectiveness and ethics. Our founder, Noura, believed that beauty should never come at the cost of animal welfare or environmental damage. Today, we continue that mission with every product we create.
